game.name: TS Marketplace: Tehachapi Pass Scenario Pack 02
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tehachapi Pass Scenario Pack 02, from accomplished developer High Iron Simulations, brings dynamic and contemporary Union Pacific and BNSF railroading to the popular Train Simulator Classic Tehachapi Pass route with ten new and highly authentic career scenarios.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tehachapi Pass Scenario Pack 02, from accomplished developer High Iron Simulations, brings dynamic and contemporary Union Pacific and BNSF railroading to the popular Train Simulator Classic Tehachapi Pass route with ten new and highly authentic career scenarios.
